casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Manuel Enrique SANTANA, Jr. No. 121P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Santana, Manuel Enrique (Jr.). Stuart M. Saunders, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of April 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
